label: Intelligence
flavor: You imbue the item with brilliant intelligence.
level-8-spell: The item can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZYoC630tNGutgbE0]{Hypercognition} once per day as an occult spell.
level-14-spell: The item can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZYoC630tNGutgbE0]{Hypercognition} once per hour as an occult spell.
level-17-apex: When you invest the item, you either increase your Intelligence attribute by 1 or increase it to +4, whichever would give you a higher value. The item gains the apex trait.
level-20-spell: The item can cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ZYoC630tNGutgbE0]{Hypercognition} once per minute as an occult spell.
